1.18.2.1.1: Added Crab Rangoon, Prickly Pear Juice, Chunkwich, Tin Knife.
1.18.2.1.2: Added Silver & Brass Knives, Jelly Bottle.
1.18.2.1.3: Added Bone Knife, Nut Butter Bottle.
1.18.2.1.4: Added Nut Butter and Jelly Sandwich, Ender Nectar.
1.18.2.1.5.1: Fixed block drops for Quartz Cabinet. (Still broken).
1.18.2.1.5.2: Actually fixed block drops for Quartz Cabinet.
1.18.2.1.6: Added Basalt Cabinet, Constantan Knife, Electrum Knife, Invar Knife, Lead Knife, Nickel Knife.
1.18.2.1.7: Added configuration file. Fixed some recipes and item properties.
1.18.2.1.8: Added Azalea Tea & Honey Glazed Walnut (Thanks snommersnommers!). Added Green Tea Leaf and Chunk Nugget.
1.18.2.1.9: Added Salmonberry, Matcha, Matcha Latte, Berry Matcha Latte, Animal Fat, Animal Oil Bottle.
1.18.2.1.10: Added Cactus Flesh, Cactus Steak, Glow Jelly Bottle, Salmonberry Sack, Mini Melon, Lavender Tea, Chopped Clover, Field Salad, Rock Candy.
1.18.2.1.11: Fix crash with some languages, add tag support for Sprout and other mods.
1.18.2.1.12: Add support for Create's Rose Quartz. Fix some console logs.
1.18.2.2.0: Added some compat mobs to fatty_animals tag. Add Twilight Forest's Torchberries to berries tag. Removed Cultural Delights recipe override.

1.19.2.1: Added some compat mobs to fatty_animals tag. Add Twilight Forest's Torchberries to berries tag. Removed Cultural Delights recipe override.
1.19.2.2: Added Acorn, Salmonberry Pips (for growing). More compat fatty_animals. Minor tag, loot modifier, and recipe fixes.
1.19.2.3: Added Twilight Forest knives. Added smelting/blasting knife into compat Diamond Nuggets. Minor recipe changes.
1.19.2.4: Fixed Twilight Forest knives missing abilities, and the recipe for the Fiery Knife.
1.19.2.5: Added knives from Forbidden and Arcanus and Roots Classic. Added some more recipe compat. Changed a few textures.
1.19.2.6: Update knife recipes to FD 1.2. Added (disabled by default) Emerald and Amethyst knives. Added Acorn Sack, Raw/Cooked Goat, Raw/Cooked Venison Chops.
1.19.3.0: Added slicing of some melons/gourds. Added Salmonberry Pie, Salmonberry Ice Cream. Added compat for Ars Nouveau, with an FD-style overhaul of their Source Berry Pie. Added overhaul of vanilla Pumpkin Pie. Added knives from SimpleOres and Fusion. Textures changes, fixes.
1.19.3.1: Pie overhaul for four pies from Oh the Biomes You'll Go. Added Pendorite & Allthemodium Knives. Added Matcha Ice Cream. Added Fixed Onyx Knife recipe.
1.19.3.1.1: Added Warden Knife. Fixed Matcha Ice Cream using wrong food. Minor tag changes and cleanup.
1.19.3.1.2: Added Zinc Knife, Gilded Quartz Knife, Leaf Knife, Kiwano Knife. Moved Lapis Lazuli Knife to disabled by default. Cleanup and tags. Add chinese translation.
1.19.3.1.3: Fixed crash with Farmer's Respite and enhanced compat. Fixed some possible datapack bugs. Minor tag changes.
1.19.3.1.4: Removed disabled items from Creative Tab and JEI. Override some recipes from Wild Berries. Fix venison chops dupe.
1.19.3.2.1: Renamed Goat to Chevon and updated texture. Slightly changed Sinigang texture. Recipe, tag, and other miscellaneous fixes.
1.19.3.2.2: Wandering Trader support, Salmonberries require rain.
1.19.3.2.3: Added Matcha and Salmonberry Ice Cream block, Salmonberries provide Water Breathing.
